# required packages

```{r}
require(ranger)
require(gaston)
require(here)
require(tictoc)
```

# data preparation

```{r}
hdra.org <- read.csv(here("HDRA/HDRA_Data/HDRA_Zero_CompressedData", "HDRA_Compress_3.csv"))
head(hdra.org[,1:5])
```
```{r}
hdra.t <- t(hdra.org)
head(hdra.t[,1:6])
```

```{r}
hdra <- hdra.t
#rownames(hdra) <- hdra.t[,1]
dim(hdra)
head(hdra[,1:5])
```

```{r}
saveRDS(hdra, here("HDRA/HDRA_Data/HDRA_Zero_CompressedData", "HDRA_Compress_3.rds"))
```

```{r}
tic()
hdra2 <- readRDS(here("HDRA/HDRA_Data/HDRA_Zero_CompressedData", "HDRA_Compress_3.rds"))
toc()
```
